Mitchell Leff / Getty Images Sport / Getty Report: Bryant helped off practice field, Saints fear torn Achilles Mike Alessandrini Nov 9 2018, 4:04 PM It appears the Dez Bryant era in New Orleans could be over before it started. The wide receiver was helped off the field at practice Friday after suffering what the Saints fear may be a torn Achilles, sources told NFL Network's Tom Pelissero amazon music New music, all the time New subscribers onlyS
